org.qcri.rheem.core.optimizer.enumeration

Class ExecutionTaskFlow

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.optimizer.enumeration.ExecutionTaskFlow

  • public class ExecutionTaskFlow
extends java.lang.Object
    Graph of ExecutionTasks and Channels. Does not define ExecutionStages and PlatformExecutions - in contrast to a final ExecutionPlan.
